name: The Last Blossom (leo_calil)
description:
"The Last Blossom" is a 2d platformer game meant to deliver a meaningful message.

The planet is on the edge of destruction. Find a way to help the world through the last blossom.

Game submitted for My First Game Jam: Winter 2022.

------------------------------------------------

This was my second full game jam, I did everything alone except for the soundtrack and SFXs, as well as the letters, who were found freely through the community.

Soundtrack: Sergey Cheremisinov - Green Eyes

Bell SFX - Mixkit

Jump SFX -  Iwan Gabovitch

Font - The VT323 Project Authors (peter.hull@oikoi.com)
